segments.text: I don't know if you remember , but with honest every day last year we tided the knot .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course I remember , actually , I am very surprised you remembered , I thought for sure you would forget .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How could I ever forget ? I even bought you roses because I love you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They are so beautiful . I love them , and I love you too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are more beautiful than the roses .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know how , but I love you more than the day we gotta married .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we are match made in heaven .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know of the past years we have faced and shared troubles , but we survived and here we are .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we did , we did have problems , but we shared a lot of happiness too . We countered the problems , and had a lot of happiness too .
segments.speaker: S1
